TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SipAudioCall extends Java.Lang.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This class is obsoleted in this android platform")

Docs.summary: Handles an Internet audio call over SIP.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AnswerCall(int32 timeout) cil managed
abstract member AnswerCall : int -> unit override this.AnswerCall : int -> unit

Docs.param: the timeout value in seconds. Default value (defined by SIP protocol) is used if timeout is zero or negative.
Docs.summary: Answers a call.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the SIP service fails to answer the call

Docs.param: the session that receives the incoming call
the session description of the incoming call
Docs.summary: Attaches an incoming call to this call object.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the SIP service fails to attach this object to the session or VOIP API is not supported by the device

Docs.param: the SIP profile to make the call to
the SipSession for carrying out the call
the timeout value in seconds. Default value (defined by SIP protocol) is used if timeout is zero or negative.
Docs.summary: Initiates an audio call to the specified profile.

Docs.exception: if the SIP service fails to create a session for the call or VOIP API is not supported by the device
